name: Milk Yield Prediction and Optimization
desc: Developed a model to forecast and optimize milk yield using Linear Programming.

name: Trash Detection AI
desc: Developed a multi-object detection system using YOLOv5, Haar cascades, and MediaPipe with 94 % trash, face, and hand detection accuracy.

name: Leaf Segmentation and counting
desc: Designed a machine learning model using U-Net for segmenting rice leaves in images.

name: RAG
desc: This project is a Question-Answering (QA) chatbot built using the Haystack framework. It answers natural language questions about nutrients based on a structured dataset. It uses a combination of FAISS for semantic search and a pre-trained language model for extractive QA.

name: NLP
desc: This project is a Question-Answering (QA) chatbot built using the Haystack framework. It answers natural language questions about nutrients based on a structured dataset. It uses a combination of FAISS for semantic search and a pre-trained language model for extractive QA.

name: OCR
desc: Basic burger shop webpage allow users to check menu and price. Dummy Order Form.

name: predictor
desc: This project is a price predictor for a car based on its features. It uses a pre-trained model to predict the price of a car based on its specifications.

name: chatbot
desc: This is a chatbit made using api of OpenAI. It allows users to chat with the bot and get responses based on the input provided.

name: Langchain
desc: This is an langchain project that demonstrates how to use Langchain for building applications with large language models. It includes examples of how to use Langchain for various tasks such as text generation, summarization, and question answering.
